name: Chicken Gun
description:
Chicken Gun is a top-down 2D shooter with four unique game modes where you must defend your farm against bears, foxes, raccoons, and snakes.  You play as a farmer with nothing but his chickens to defend himself. Buy different chicken guns and blast your foes away with eggs, and survive as long as you can. This game was made entirely in blender, the art was made in Gimp, and all music was from the YouTube audio library. 

This game was made by Green Lizard Gaming (partnered with Bomb_lobber_500). 

If you have any suggestions or comments, please leave them down below. We would really love to hear your feedback!
